title: Uber Suspends Pool Service in U.S. and Canada Amid Covid-19 Outbreak
description: As health officials call for social distancing amid the global coronavirus pandemic as a means of mitigating its spread, Uber has announced that it’s suspended all Pool services in the United States and Canada as of Tuesday. Read more...
content: As health officials call for social distancing amid the global coronavirus pandemic as a means of mitigating its spread Uber has announced that its suspended all Pool services in the United States and Canada as of Tuesday The company said the decision was chars
